summary.span: Returns the distance between the latitude and longitude coordinates that are specified by this and another specified .

span.span: Returns the distance between the latitude and longitude coordinates that are specified by this and another specified .

returns.span: The distance between the two coordinates, in meters.

span.span: The distance between the two coordinates, in meters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 半正矢公式用于计算距离。The Haversine formula is used to calculate the distance. 半正矢公式是地球曲率的一种，但采用球形地球而不是椭圆体。The Haversine formula accounts for the curvature of the earth, but assumes a spherical earth rather than an ellipsoid. 对于长距离，半正矢公式引入了小于0.1% 的错误。For long distances, the Haversine formula introduces an error of less than 0.1 percent. 海拔不用于计算距离。Altitude is not used to calculate the distance.
